namuth thirappaneta jalaya labune natha.me nisa thirappaneta jala sampadana kramayak salasum kerina. 2007 wasare di aasiyanu sanwardhana bankuwen praja mula jala sampadana yojana kramayak athi kirima sandaha rupiyal ekkoti wisi lakshayaka mudalak muda harina.gramiya jala sampadana yojana kramaya kriyathmaka kirimata game “isuru diyadahara praja mula sanwidhanaya” namin samithiyakda gammu pihituwa gathha.samithiye yojana anuwa gami pawul harasiyayaka mulya dayakathwaya washayen rupiyal laksha 22 kda shrama dayakathwaya washayen rupiyal hathalis panlakshayaka agayak da ekathu kota jala sampadana wyapruthiya aarambha kerina.

pahu giya dawasaka mama jiwithaye dakinna apriyama karana minihek mata munagahuna ahamben.mama wada iwara wela gedara eddi eka paratama mama issarahata hamuna me miniha putha mawa adunanawada kiyala ahuwa.mamath ithin ow kiwuwe me minihage muna kawadawath amathaka nowana hinda,passe miniha amma,thaththa kohomada,mamala kohomada eka eka wisthara ahuwa mamath keti uththara dila ikmaninma mama yanna giya.2002 janawariya mama sa.pe karala gedara inna kale,thawath ape game kollo set eke thawa kipa denekma wibhage karala parema thama wade,ohoma iddi eka paratama aaranchiyak aawa chandanayawa polisiyen genichcha minimarumakata kiyala,chandanaya kiyanne apita wada wasara 2n withara wadimal,ape gewal gawa gadol poranuwaka wada karana kollek,gama koheda danneth na muge thaththath na amma,bappa ekka thama ee poranuwe hitiye,habayi ape gamata awilla wasara kipayak mua iskole yanneth na, ahaddi kiyanne 5 wasarata wenakan giya passe nawathuna kiyala,ee unata gadola kaduwala thiyana gadola gana kal ekakwath nathuwa itha ikmanin kiyanna muta hakiyawak thibuna,katawath waradak karapu ahinsaka kolla,habayi muta wayasa 15 withara weddima ganja walata purudu una,ohoma kale yaddi thama ape gamen 1990 withara ithali gihin ithaliyedi loka apathayek una thusharaya path une habayi mu kalen kaleta gamata enawa habayi sathe athe na,mu ithaliyata yaddith game rasthiyadukarayek wela thama idala thiyenne ethakota uuta 17 withara athilu, ee gihin loke thiyana serama math kudu walata puruduwela, ehema iddi thama 2001 withara mu aaye kada path une gamata,mua ithaliye idala aawata kawuruth muwa ganan ganneth na mu gawa sathe atheth na.ohomaiddi thama chandanayawa muta set une uuth ganja karaya ne.niyama dabala ee tike mun denna ekatama thama.eth ohoma 2001 okthombar withara ekaparatama thusharaya athurudana una aaranchi une aaye ithali giya kiyala,game katawath hoyanna uwamanawak thibuneth na..passe ohoma kale yaddi thama apita ara aaranchiya aawe chandanayawa polisiyen genichcha kiyala.
